text: "Breakdown" is a song by the American heavy metal band Queensrÿche. It was released as a single in support of their 1999 album Q2K. == Formats and track listing == ;US CD single (PRCD 9040) #"Breakdown" (radio edit) – 3:08 #"Breakdown" (album version) – 4:12 == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (1999) !Peak position |- | U.S. Billboard Mainstream Rock | style="text-align:center;"|27 |- |} == References == == External links == * Category:1999 songs Category:1999 singles Category:Queensrÿche songs Category:Atlantic Records singles Category:Songs written by Eddie Jackson (musician) Category:Songs written by Scott Rockenfield Category:Songs written by Geoff Tate Category:Songs written by Michael Wilton Category:American hard rock songs
title: Breakdown (Queensrÿche song)
